short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons to the CivicPlus Central sites for automation and quality of life improvements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives Web Content Editors additonal buttons when uploading multiple agendas, minutes, and archive items to our CivicPlus Central websites.
